about.description: sphinx-apidoc is a tool for automatic generation of Sphinx sources that, using the autodoc extension, documents a whole package in the style of other automatic API documentation tools. sphinx-apidoc does not actually build documentation - rather it simply generates it. As a result, it must be run before sphinx-build.
about.summary: A Sphinx extension for running sphinx-apidoc on each build.

about.description: sphinx-apidoc is a tool for automatic generation of Sphinx sources that, using the autodoc extension, documents a whole package in the style of other automatic API documentation tools. sphinx-apidoc does not actually build documentation - rather it simply generates it. As a result, it must be run before sphinx-build.
about.summary: A Sphinx extension for running sphinx-apidoc on each build.

name: sphinxcontrib-apidoc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sphinxcontrib-apidoc" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 729bf592cf7b7dd57c4c05794f732dc026127275d785c2a5494521fdde773fb9

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - pbr
  run:
    - pbr
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - sphinxcontrib

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/sphinxcontrib-apidoc/
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Sphinx extension for running sphinx-apidoc on each build.'
  description:
    sphinx-apidoc is a tool for automatic generation of Sphinx sources that,
    using the autodoc extension, documents a whole package in the style of
    other automatic API documentation tools. sphinx-apidoc does not actually
    build documentation - rather it simply generates it. As a result, it must
    be run before sphinx-build. 
  doc_url: https://pypi.org/project/sphinxcontrib-apidoc/
  dev_url: https://github.com/sphinx-contrib/apidoc 

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CurtLH
